00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : FinalDump
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : Carlos Rosales Fernandez [carlos.rosales.fernandez(at)gmail.com]
00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00034 
00035 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00036 ! Copyright 2008 Carlos Rosales Fernandez, David S. Whyte and IHPC (A*STAR).
00037 !
00038 ! This file is part of MP-LABS.
00039 !
00040 ! MP-LABS is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the
00041 ! terms of the GNU GPL version 3 or (at your option) any later version.

00049 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00050 
00051  SUBROUTINE FinalDump
00052 
00053 !  Common Variables
00054  USE NTypes,      ONLY : DBL
00055  USE Domain
00056  USE FluidParams
00057  USE LBMParams,   ONLY : invCs_sq, g
00058  USE MPIParams
00059  USE MPI
00060  IMPLICIT NONE
00061 
00062 !  Local Variables
00063  INTEGER :: i, j, k, ie, iw, jn, js, kt, kb
00064  INTEGER :: IO_ERR, MPI_ERR
00065  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: Pin, Pout, Ro, R, Pdif, Perr, Umax, Ref, Vef, Vol
00066  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: distroMem, auxMem, mpiMem, totalMem, memUnit, Mb
00067  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: ux, uy, uz, phin, phin2, pressure, rhon, invRhon
00068  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: gradPhiX, gradPhiY, gradPhiZ, gradPhiSq, lapPhi
00069  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: in00, in01, in02, in03, in04, in05, in06, in07, in08, in09
00070  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: in10, in11, in12, in13, in14, in15, in16, in17, in18
00071  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: UmaxLocal, UmaxGlobal
00072  REAL(KIND = DBL), DIMENSION(1:3) :: memLocal, memGlobal
00073  REAL(KIND = DBL), DIMENSION(1:5) :: dataLocal, dataGlobal
00074 
00075 
00076 ! Initialize
00077  Ro = bubbles(1,4)
00078  UmaxLocal     = 0.D0
00079  UmaxGlobal    = 0.D0
00080  dataLocal(:)  = 0.D0
00081  dataGlobal(:) = 0.D0
00082 
00083 ! Calculate pressure inside and outside the bubble, maximum velocity in the
00084 ! domain and effective radius
00085  DO k = zl, zu
00086    DO j = yl, yu
00087      DO i = xl, xu
00088 
00089        rhon    = SUM( g(i,j,k,:,now) )
00090        invRhon = 1.D0/rhon
00091        phin    = phi(i,j,k)
00092        phin2   = phin*phin
00093 
00094 ! Identify neighbours
00095        ie = ni(i,j,k,1)
00096        iw = ni(i,j,k,2)
00097        jn = ni(i,j,k,3)
00098        js = ni(i,j,k,4)
00099        kt = ni(i,j,k,5)
00100        kb = ni(i,j,k,6)
00101 
00102 ! Nodal values of the order parameter
00103        in00 = phi(i ,j ,k )
00104        in01 = phi(ie,j ,k )
00105        in02 = phi(iw,j ,k )
00106        in03 = phi(i ,jn,k )
00107        in04 = phi(i ,js,k )
00108        in05 = phi(i ,j ,kt)
00109        in06 = phi(i ,j ,kb)
00110        in07 = phi(ie,jn,k )
00111        in08 = phi(iw,js,k )
00112        in09 = phi(ie,js,k )
00113        in10 = phi(iw,jn,k )
00114        in11 = phi(ie,j ,kt)
00115        in12 = phi(iw,j ,kb)
00116        in13 = phi(ie,j ,kb)
00117        in14 = phi(iw,j ,kt)
00118        in15 = phi(i ,jn,kt)
00119        in16 = phi(i ,js,kb)
00120        in17 = phi(i ,jn,kb)
00121        in18 = phi(i ,js,kt)
00122 
00123 ! Laplacian of the order parameter
00124        lapPhi = ( in07 + in08 + in09 + in10 + in11 + in12 + in13 + in14 &
00125               + in15 + in16 + in17 + in18 + 2.0D0*( in01 + in02 + in03  &
00126               + in04 + in05 + in06 - 12.D0*in00 ) )*inv6
00127 
00128 ! Components of the order parameter gradient
00129        gradPhiX  = ( 2.0D0*( in01 - in02 ) + in07 - in08 + in09 - in10 &
00130                  + in11 - in12 + in13 - in14 )*inv12
00131 
00132        gradPhiY  = ( 2.0D0*( in03 - in04 ) + in07 - in08 + in10 - in09 &
00133                  + in15 - in16 + in17 - in18 )*inv12
00134 
00135        gradPhiZ  = ( 2.0D0*( in05 - in06 ) + in11 - in12 + in14 - in13 &
00136                  + in15 - in16 + in18 - in17 )*inv12
00137 
00138        gradPhiSq = gradPhiX*gradPhiX + gradPhiY*gradPhiY + gradPhiZ*gradPhiZ
00139 
00140 ! Calculate the pressure
00141        pressure = alpha*(3.D0*phin2*phin2 - 2.D0*phiStar2*( phin2 - phiStar2 ) ) &
00142                 - kappa*( phin*lapPhi - 0.5D0*gradPhiSq ) + invCs_sq*rhon
00143 
00144 ! Calculate the velocity
00145        ux = ( g(i,j,k, 1,now) - g(i,j,k, 2,now) + g(i,j,k, 7,now) &
00146           -   g(i,j,k, 8,now) + g(i,j,k, 9,now) - g(i,j,k,10,now) &
00147           +   g(i,j,k,11,now) - g(i,j,k,12,now) + g(i,j,k,13,now) &
00148           - g(i,j,k,14,now) )*invRhon
00149 
00150        uy = ( g(i,j,k, 3,now) - g(i,j,k, 4,now) + g(i,j,k, 7,now) &
00151           -   g(i,j,k, 8,now) - g(i,j,k, 9,now) + g(i,j,k,10,now) &
00152           +   g(i,j,k,15,now) - g(i,j,k,16,now) + g(i,j,k,17,now) &
00153           - g(i,j,k,18,now) )*invRhon
00154 
00155        uz = ( g(i,j,k, 5,now) - g(i,j,k, 6,now) + g(i,j,k,11,now) &
00156           -   g(i,j,k,12,now) - g(i,j,k,13,now) + g(i,j,k,14,now) &
00157           +   g(i,j,k,15,now) - g(i,j,k,16,now) - g(i,j,k,17,now) &
00158           + g(i,j,k,18,now) )*invRhon
00159 
00160        R =  DSQRT( (DBLE(i)-bubbles(1,1))**2 + (DBLE(j)-bubbles(1,2))**2 &
00161          + (DBLE(k)-bubbles(1,3))**2 )
00162 
00163        IF ( R < (Ro - IntWidth) ) THEN
00164          dataLocal(2) = dataLocal(2) + 1.D0
00165          dataLocal(4) = dataLocal(4) + pressure
00166        ELSE IF ( R > (Ro + IntWidth) ) THEN
00167          dataLocal(3) = dataLocal(3) + 1.D0
00168          dataLocal(5) = dataLocal(5) + pressure
00169        END IF
00170 
00171        IF ( phi(i,j,k) >= 0.D0 ) dataLocal(1) = dataLocal(1) + 1.D0
00172 
00173        Umax = DSQRT( ux*ux + uy*uy + uz*uz )
00174        IF ( Umax > UmaxLocal ) UmaxLocal = Umax
00175 
00176      END DO
00177    END DO
00178  END DO
00179 
00180 ! Gather global data
00181  CALL MPI_ALLREDUCE(dataLocal, dataGlobal, 5, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00182  CALL MPI_ALLREDUCE(UmaxLocal, UmaxGlobal, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, MPI_MAX, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00183  Vol = dataGlobal(1)
00184 
00185 ! Calculate compliance with Laplace Law
00186  Pin  = dataGlobal(4)/dataGlobal(2)
00187  Pout = dataGlobal(5)/dataGlobal(3)
00188  Pdif = Pin - Pout
00189  Perr = 0.5D0*(2.D0*sigma/Ro - Pdif)*Ro/sigma
00190 
00191 ! Calculate phase conservation
00192  Ref = ( Vol*invPi )**(1.D0/3.D0)
00193  Vef = Vol*invInitVol
00194 
00195 ! Estimate memory usage (Mb)
00196  Mb      = 1.D0/( 1024.D0*1024.D0 )
00197  memUnit = ( NX + 2 )*( NY + 2)*( NZ + 2)
00198 
00199  memLocal(1) = 8.D0*52.D0*memUnit
00200  memLocal(2) = 8.D0*memUnit + 4.D0*6.D0*memUnit
00201  memLocal(3) = 8.D0*( 8.D0*( xsize + ysize + zsize) &
00202              + 4.D0*( xsize5 + ysize5 + zsize5 )    &
00203              + 16.D0*( xedge + yedge + zedge ) )
00204 
00205  CALL MPI_ALLREDUCE(memLocal, memGlobal, 3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00206  distroMem = memGlobal(1)*Mb
00207  auxMem    = memGlobal(2)*Mb
00208  mpiMem    = memGlobal(3)*Mb
00209  totalMem  = distroMem + auxMem + mpiMem
00210 
00211 ! Save data to file from the master node only
00212  IF( vproc == master ) THEN
00213    OPEN(UNIT = 10, FILE = "final.out", STATUS = "NEW", POSITION = "APPEND", &
00214         IOSTAT = IO_ERR)
00215    IF ( IO_ERR == 0 ) THEN
00216      WRITE(10,'(A)')'*** Multiphase Zheng-Shu-Chew LBM 3D Simulation ***'
00217      WRITE(10,'(A)')'*** Standard Implementation (MPI Parallel)      ***'
00218      WRITE(10,*)
00219      WRITE(10,'(A)')'INPUT PARAMETERS'
00220      WRITE(10,'(A,I9)')'Total Iterations       = ',MaxStep+1
00221      WRITE(10,'(A,I9)')'Relaxation Iterations  = ',RelaxStep
00222      WRITE(10,'(A,I9)')'Length in X Direction  = ',xmax
00223      WRITE(10,'(A,I9)')'Length in Y Direction  = ',ymax
00224      WRITE(10,'(A,I9)')'Length in Z Direction  = ',zmax
00225      WRITE(10,'(A,I9)')'Number of X Partitions = ',mpi_xdim
00226      WRITE(10,'(A,I9)')'Number of Y Partitions = ',mpi_ydim
00227      WRITE(10,'(A,I9)')'Number of Z Partitions = ',mpi_zdim
00228      WRITE(10,'(A,I9)')'Total Number of CPUs   = ',mpi_xdim*mpi_ydim*mpi_zdim
00229      WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'Interface Width        = ',IntWidth
00230      WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'Interface Tension      = ',sigma
00231      WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'Interface Mobility     = ',Gamma
00232      WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'RhoL    = ',rhoL
00233      WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'RhoH    = ',rhoH
00234      WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'TauRho  = ',tauRho
00235      WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'TauPhi  = ',tauPhi
00236      WRITE(10,*)
00237      WRITE(10,'(A)')'MEMORY USAGE (Mb)'
00238      WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'Distributions     = ',distroMem
00239      WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'Auxiliary Arrays  = ',auxMem
00240      WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'MPI buffer Arrays = ',mpiMem
00241      WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'Total Memory Used = ',totalMem
00242      WRITE(10,*)
00243      WRITE(10,'(A)')'OUTPUT RESULTS'
00244      WRITE(10,'(A,ES19.9)')'Effective Radius   = ',Ref
00245      WRITE(10,'(A,ES19.9)')'Phase Conservation = ',Vef
00246      WRITE(10,'(A,ES19.9)')'(Pin - Pout)       = ',Pdif
00247      WRITE(10,'(A,ES19.9)')'Laplace Error      = ',Perr
00248      WRITE(10,'(A,ES19.9)')'Parasitic Velocity = ',UmaxGlobal
00249      WRITE(10,*)
00250      WRITE(10,'(A)')'***       Simulation Finished Succesfully       ***'
00251      CLOSE(UNIT = 10)
00252    ELSE
00253      CALL MemAlloc(2)
00254      CALL MPI_FINALIZE(MPI_ERR)
00255      STOP "Error: unable to open output file 'final.out'."
00256    END IF
00257  END IF
00258 
00259  RETURN
00260  END SUBROUTINE FinalDump
Generated on Mon Nov 10 16:42:46 2008 for ZSC-3D-STD-MPI by  1.5.6
